roleset.name: sham belief
roleset.note: ILLUSION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, dream-n.01. No VNcls. (from illusion.01-n)

example.name: both args
example.text: His illusion that someday she would come around overrode his ability to accept the reality that she was never going to be genuinely interested in him
example.arg: that someday she would come around
